outputs.output_descr: The UN Country Team provides oversight and manages activities leading up to the completion of the UN Eco Shared Premises In Podgorica in 2009. The construction process of the UN Eco Shared Premises in Montenegro done in a close cooperation with the Government and its responsible agencies leading the construction process. The final design of the building satisfies all the energy efficiency and ecological requirements.
